snippet: Buffeted by international instability, the president stresses that there are limits to American power, and that the chief executive is not omnipotent.
abstract: News analysis; Pres Obama, facing frustration over turmoil in places like Syria, Iraq and Ukraine, has garnered additional criticism for stressing the limits of American power and the office of the chief executive in particular; some of his comments appear as an attempt to excuse his failures and inaction.
lead_paragraph: Buffeted by international instability, the president stresses that there are limits to American power, and that the chief executive is not omnipotent.

headline.main: As World Boils, Fingers Point Obama’s Way
